member.name: GetPropertyFromIDList.GetPropertyFromIDList
member.summary: Gets a property from the within the IDList as a variant, using the key.
member.param: The key for the selected property.
When this method returns, contains a pointer to the property. If rkey is not found, pvar will be VT_EMPTY.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.
